mapper.select: select reviewFile from review where reviewNum=#{reviewNum}
select count(*) from review r, orders o where r.orderNum = o.orderNum and productNum = #{productNum}
mapper.insert: insert into review (reviewNum, userID, productNum, reviewContent, reviewFile, reviewScore) values ((select nvl(max(reviewNum)+1, 1) from review), #{userID}, #{productNum}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewFile}, #{reviewScore})
mapper.update: update review set reviewScore=#{reviewScore}, reviewContent=#{reviewContent}, reviewFileName=#{reviewFile}, where reviewNum=#{reviewNum}
